thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Capitec Bank Says Shareholders Can Expect Release Of Fresh Attacks

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Capitec Bank Says Shareholders Can Expect Release Of Fresh Attacks

organizations.name: brief-capitec bank says shareholders can expect release of fresh attacks feb

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Capitec Bank Holdings Ltd:
* ‍IN RESPONSE TO LATEST SET OF ALLEGATIONS THAT VICEROY RESEARCH GROUP HAS RELEASED ON MONDAY 5 FEBRUARY​
* “SHAREHOLDERS CAN EXPECT RELEASE OF FRESH ATTACKS AND FALSE ALLEGATIONS OVER AN EXTENDED PERIOD”​
* CAPITEC BANK HOLDINGS- ‍“ARREARS FIGURES REPORTED BY CAPITEC ON THESE LOANS ARE ACCURATE AND IN LINE WITH OUR RISK APPETITE AND PORTFOLIO TRACKING RESULTS”​
* “‍PROVISIONS RAISED AGAINST THESE LOANS ARE CONSERVATIVE”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
